comments.body: I don't know how the plugin system works, but do we need a unique name for each depth (e.g. `fmt.Sprintf("%s%d" pluginName, i)`)?
In this test, just the socket path needs to be unique, but it might be better to have unique plugin names.

diffHunk:
@@ -1,1 +155,159 @@		// Add a new plugin
		pluginName := fmt.Sprintf("example-plugin-%d", i)
		p := pluginwatcher.NewTestExamplePlugin(pluginName, registerapi.DevicePlugin, socketPath, supportedVersions...)
		require.NoError(t, p.Serve("v1beta1", "v1beta2"))
